languages.text: {n}Канцлер слегка отводит глаза — впервые за время разговора. Очевидно, Клеменциа печется о добром имени собственного рода. Но, несмотря на уверенный тон, она явно не до конца верит в собственные слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Канцлер слегка отводит глаза — впервые за время разговора. Очевидно, Клеменциа печется о добром имени собственного рода. Но, несмотря на уверенный тон, она явно не до конца верит в собственные слова.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Канцлер слегка отводит глаза — впервые за время разговора. Очевидно, Клеменциа печется о добром имени собственного рода. Но, несмотря на уверенный тон, она явно не до конца верит в собственные слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}

{n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你发现她在试着避开你的视线，这还是第一次。很显然，克莱门缇雅很在意家族的好名声。不过，尽管她的语气中充满了自信，你却意识到，她并非完全相信她自己的话。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你发现她在试着避开你的视线，这还是第一次。很显然，克莱门缇雅很在意家族的好名声。不过，尽管她的语气中充满了自信，你却意识到，她并非完全相信她自己的话。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por primera vez, notas que rehúye tu mirada. Está claro que Clementia vela por el buen nombre de su casa. Sin embargo, a pesar de la confianza de su tono, puedes ver que no se cree del todo lo que está diciendo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por primera vez, notas que rehúye tu mirada. Está claro que Clementia vela por el buen nombre de su casa. Sin embargo, a pesar de la confianza de su tono, puedes ver que no se cree del todo lo que está diciendo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女がほんの一瞬、視線を外したのをとらえる。初めてのことだった。クレメンティアが自分の家系の名声のために配慮しているのは明らかだが、その自信に満ちた口調とは裏腹に、彼女は自分の言葉を完全に信じているわけではないことがわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女がほんの一瞬、視線を外したのをとらえる。初めてのことだった。クレメンティアが自分の家系の名声のために配慮しているのは明らかだが、その自信に満ちた口調とは裏腹に、彼女は自分の言葉を完全に信じているわけではないことがわかる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass sie deinem Blick für einen Sekundenbruchteil ausweicht – zum ersten Mal. Offensichtlich ist Clementia dran gelegen, den guten Ruf ihres Hauses zu wahren. Aber trotz der Zuversicht in ihrer Stimme merkst du, dass sie ihren eigenen Worten nicht vollständig vertraut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass sie deinem Blick für einen Sekundenbruchteil ausweicht – zum ersten Mal. Offensichtlich ist Clementia dran gelegen, den guten Ruf ihres Hauses zu wahren. Aber trotz der Zuversicht in ihrer Stimme merkst du, dass sie ihren eigenen Worten nicht vollständig vertraut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour la toute première fois, Clémentia fuit votre regard un bref instant. Si elle fait visiblement son possible pour ne pas ternir le nom de sa maison, vous sentez que sa confiance n'est manifestement pas aussi absolue qu'elle l'aimerait.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour la toute première fois, Clémentia fuit votre regard un bref instant. Si elle fait visiblement son possible pour ne pas ternir le nom de sa maison, vous sentez que sa confiance n'est manifestement pas aussi absolue qu'elle l'aimerait.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İlk kez, hem de bir anlığına bakışlarını senden kaçırdığını fark ediyorsun. Clementia'nın, hanesinin namusuna leke sürdürmek istemediği belli oluyor. Öte yandan ses tonundaki öz güvene rağmen kendi söylediklerine tamamen inanmadığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You catch her avoiding your gaze for just a moment — for the first time. It's obvious that Clementia is looking out for her house's good name. But despite the confidence in her tone, you can tell that she does not entirely believe her own words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İlk kez ve sadece bir anlığına, bakışlarını senden kaçırdığını fark ediyorsun. Clementia'nın hanesinin namusuna leke sürdürmek istemediği belli oluyor. Öte yandan, ses tonundaki öz güvene rağmen, Clementia'nın kendi söylediklerine tamamen inanmadığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
